Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: ResearchStudyStatus
Title: ResearchStudyStatus
Descriptino: Codes that convey the current status of the research study.

Name: SNOMED_CT
Title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
Descriptino: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

Name: ResearchStudyObjectiveType
Title: ResearchStudyObjectiveType
Descriptino: Codes for the kind of study objective.

Name: ResearchStudyPhase
Title: ResearchStudyPhase
Descriptino: Codes for the stage in the progression of a therapy from initial experimental use in humans in clinical trials to post-market evaluation.

Name: ResearchStudyPrimaryPurposeType
Title: ResearchStudyPrimaryPurposeType
Descriptino: Codes for the main intent of the study.

Name: ResearchStudyReasonStopped
Title: ResearchStudyReasonStopped
Descriptino: Codes for why the study ended prematurely.

Name: ContactRole2
Title: contactRole2
Descriptino: Code system of concepts which specify a relationship role that the next of kin/associated parties plays with regard to the patient. Also used in referrals, for example, it may be necessary to identify the contact representative at the clinic that sent a referral. Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the NK1 and CTD segments after 2.5, when it replace 2.16.840.1.113883.18.57.

Name: MaritalStatus
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: \* \* \* No description supplied \* \* \*    *Open Issue:* The specific meanings of these codes can vary somewhat by jurisdiction and implementation so caution should be used when determining equivalency.    *Open Issue:* fixing and completion of the hierarchy and proper good definitions of all the concepts is badly needed.

Name: NullFlavor
Title: NullFlavor
Descriptino: A collection of codes specifying why a valid value is not present.

Name: Ietf3066
Title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
Descriptino: Older value from OID registry.  Superceded; see recommendations in BCP-47.

Name: ISO3166Part1
Title: ISO 3166-1 Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions â€” Part 1: Country code
Descriptino: ISO 3166-1 establishes codes that represent the current names of countries, dependencies, and other areas of particular geopolitical interest, on the basis of country names obtained from the United Nations.

Name: Iso3166_2
Title: ISO 3166 Part 2 Country Subdivision Codes
Descriptino: Identifies the coding system published in the ISO 3166-2 Standard for Country Subdivision codes. This standard is released periodically, and a new OID will be assigned by ISO for new editions.
